title: kaDaikkaN vaithennai
sahitya:
kaDaikkaN vaittennai ALammA gauri rAjarAjEshvari karuNAkari
shivashankari 
(kaDaikkaN)

anupallavi

uDaikkum tEn malar pozhil shuzh (jagadamba) umbargal
ulagum
pugazh mukhavayal uLankuLirndilangu mangaLam tarum 
(kaDaikkan)

caraNam 1

caNDikai vibhUti kANEn kaLittun anbaraip-pENEn shaNDai
vAdu sheyya nANEn tAyE
Or gati kANEn kaNDanaiyoDu daNDanai shyumoru caNDanai edir paNDanai mayiDanai
muNDanai uyir uNDanai karunayamudam pozhindidam perum padam tarum
(kaDaikkaN)

caraNam 2

tanjamenbOr tamai nOkki sarva bhAgyamum uNDAkki cancalam yAvaiyum
pOkki tAngumAi pErinbam tEkki kanjamukhi niranjani varu bhavabhanjani
janaranjani aDiyavar nenjinil ninaiyum jananiyurugi nirantaram
purandaran karam tozhum 
(kaDaikkaN)

caraNam 3

santatam pugazhndu guhadAsan manattanbu migha vandanai shei
marakatavalliyE
uLamuruga vandari ayanum darishanai puriyum tripurasundari kumari
nirantari
varakandari anudinam agat-tirundilangi mangaLam tarum 
(kaDaikkaN)
